DOC.brief_summary: This study design conduct Randomized comparative clinical study .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Leech Therapy Treatment Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Two group , group B receive Qurse Mafasil tablet orally two tablet two time daily 8 week group A receive Leech therapy weekly 8 week along Qurse mafasil .
